section.name: Analysis
section.p: This document provides an overview of the various documents (and artifacts) links that has been created in order to collect all information about Semantic Web Domain and previous SAPERE projects.

tr.td: This section provides the analysis of the LSA model that comes up from requirements (see deliverable D1.1). In particular it's focused on the determination of an API capable of embedding RDF concepts in entities of the SAPERE framework.

This section provides the analysis of the Ecolaw model that comes up from requirements (see deliverable D1.1). In particular it's focused on the determination of an API capable of embedding RDF concepts in entities of the SAPERE framework.
